title: How to Quickly and Easily Change Your Username in Pokemon Go

steps.title: Open Pokémon Go.
steps.content: Open Pokémon Go. This app icon looks like a red and white PokéBall that you can find on one of your Home screens, in the app drawer, or by searching.

steps.title: Tap the PokéBall.
steps.content: Tap the PokéBall. You'll see this centered in your screen.

steps.title: Tap .
steps.content: Tap . This gear icon is in the top right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Change Nickname.
steps.content: Tap Change Nickname . Scroll down the Settings menu to the "Account" header, and you'll see the option under your current username. If you don't see this option, you most likely have already changed your Trainer name. [1] X Research source When you tap to change your name, you'll get a pop-up warning that you can close by tapping Yes . After typing in your new name, tap Ok and Yes .
